title: My Big Feet
description: Your Page Title Product Joan L. Kelly’s work is called “highly recommended for community library fiction collections” by Midwest Book Review. Her titles also include “Hiding the The Trilogy” which is the recent recipient of the Catholic Writer’s Guild Seal of Approval.Book Rob Sanderson and his friends knew that they weren't part of the “popular” kids; but that didn't stop them from accepting each other and facing life's challenges―even when those challenges involved intrigue and espionage! See how this group of misfits combines forces to find a way to outwit dangerous spies and save their new classmate and her family from imminent danger.Character education can be painless―as evidenced by My Big Feet … Marilyn Missel, Associate Superintendent of Education; Diocese of Springfield, ILI am thrilled when a book such as My Big Feet comes along with its message of embracing each person as a unique individual… Lisa M. Hendey; CatholicMom.com
author: Joan L. Kelly
